Name: M 176 - Bennett Minko, Tax Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF BENNETT MINKO AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY TAX COMMISSION (M. 176-2023).
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, pursuant Sections 31 and 153 of the City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Bennett Minko as a member of the New York City Tax Commission to serve the remainder of a six-year term that expires on January 6, 2026 (M.176-2023).

COUPLED ON GO
